example.text: 67 million Americans are supposed to get Social Security checks in June. If House Republicans force us into default, those checks will stop going out—and millions of older Americans will lose their only source of income. [[url]]

Timely [[user]] hearing today on US competitiveness and US-China relations. As our witnesses made clear, it's critical we end the damaging debate over whether to pay our debts and instead work together on investing in our economic security and global leadership. [[url]]

Started my week today with the hardworking people with Chimes employed at Dover Air Force Base! Thanks to federal funding, [[user]] is able to help Delawareans with disabilities find fulfilling jobs and gain independence. [[url]]
Mental health care is health care. During Mental Health Awareness Month, let's redouble our efforts to raise awareness, #EndTheStigma, and save lives. [[url]]

The situation in Sudan is a devastating humanitarian crisis, with more than 700,000 already displaced and hundreds dead. I continue to urge both sides to stop fighting, return to dialogue, and honor the Sudanese people’s wishes for peace and democracy. [[url]]

Experts and lawmakers agree—generative AI comes with both transformative potential benefits and substantial risks. Congress needs to enact strong regulations to ensure these products are safe for all Americans to use. [[url]]
